nodes.name: the warranty is voided and the user will place themselves, other individuals, and the equipment in an unsafe condition

entity.name: Condition
entity.description: A condition is a specific state or situation that affects how something operates or functions, or it can refer to a requirement that must be met for something else to happen.

nodes.name: Use care when handling the vacuum chamber. Many of the chambers are very heavy. Use proper lifting equipment and safety devices.

entity.name: Warning
entity.description: A warning is a statement or indication that alerts someone to potential danger, risk, or a problem, advising them to take caution or avoid certain actions.

nodes.name: Do not lift or handle the chamber by the chamber ports, lid or associated valves. Use the provided lifting eyes or the chamber body itself to move larger chambers.

entity.name: Warning
entity.description: A warning is a statement or indication that alerts someone to potential danger, risk, or a problem, advising them to take caution or avoid certain actions.

nodes.name: Before running a vacuum process, ensure the process has been sufficiently researched and tested in order to prevent unsafe or adverse conditions from occurring.

entity.name: Warning
entity.description: A warning is a statement or indication that alerts someone to potential danger, risk, or a problem, advising them to take caution or avoid certain actions.

nodes.name: Never place objects or materials in a vacuum chamber that might explode or otherwise become a hazard when exposed to vacuum conditions.

entity.name: Warning
entity.description: A warning is a statement or indication that alerts someone to potential danger, risk, or a problem, advising them to take caution or avoid certain actions.

nodes.name: Keep all equipment associated with the vacuum chamber in proper and safe working conditions.

entity.description: A warning is a statement or indication that alerts someone to potential danger, risk, or a problem, advising them to take caution or avoid certain actions.

nodes.name: Ensure all electrical wiring associated with the chamber is done in accordance to standardized electrical codes.

entity.name: Warning
entity.description: A warning is a statement or indication that alerts someone to potential danger, risk, or a problem, advising them to take caution or avoid certain actions.

nodes.name: If using electricity in or near a metal vacuum chamber ensure the chamber itself is grounded.

entity.description: A warning is a statement or indication that alerts someone to potential danger, risk, or a problem, advising them to take caution or avoid certain actions.

nodes.name: DO NOT operate the vacuum chamber if the view port material is cracked or damaged with deep scratches or gouges.
